title: Add latest 4 uploaded photos to Memory Gallery

requirements.text: Update the Memory Gallery section (the selected Memories gallery element) to display only the latest 4 uploaded photos: IMG-20260217-WA0007-2.jpg, IMG-20260217-WA0006-2.jpg, IMG-20260217-WA0008-3.jpg, IMG-20260217-WA0009-2.jpg.

quotes: Only the last 4 photos add fast

acceptanceCriteria: The Memory Gallery grid renders exactly 4 items and uses the four specified filenames.
No placeholder memory cards remain in the Memory Gallery grid.
Each card shows the corresponding photo (not an emoji placeholder).

requirements.text: Ensure the Memory Gallery layout auto-adjusts cleanly for 4 photos across responsive breakpoints (mobile/tablet/desktop) without leaving empty columns or awkward spacing.

quotes: Only the last 4 photos add fast

acceptanceCriteria: On mobile, the gallery shows a single-column layout with 4 cards.
On small screens, the gallery shows 2 columns when space allows.
On large screens, the gallery does not render empty gaps that look like missing cards (grid should feel balanced for 4 items).

requirements.text: When a Memory Gallery card is clicked, the modal/dialog expanded view must show the same corresponding photo at larger size and allow closing to return to the grid (keeping existing smooth behavior).

quotes: add the latest 4 photos to the selected Memories section

acceptanceCriteria: Clicking any of the 4 cards opens a dialog showing that same photo in the expanded view.
The expanded view provides a clear close interaction and returns to the same scroll position in the gallery.
No dialog content instructs to 'Replace with your actual photos' for these 4 items.

constraints: Frontend immutable paths must not be edited: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui/*.
Keep all changes scoped to the Memory Gallery section implementation (frontend/src/components/sections/MemoryGallerySection.tsx) and static assets as needed.
Do not add any backend logic; backend/main.mo should remain unchanged.
nonGoals: Do not deploy/publish the site to the public internet (generate build changes only).
Do not add the other uploaded images beyond the latest 4 requested.
Do not introduce new sections or change existing section text outside the Memory Gallery.
